mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%Y.%m.%d') AS date, DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%H:%i') AS time, ENVIR.ILLUMINANCE AS illuminance, ENVIR.HORIZONTAL_ANGLE AS horizontalAngle, ENVIR.VERTICAL_ANGLE AS verticalAngle, ANALYSIS.GROWTH AS growth, ANALYSIS.CROP_SIDE_IMAGE AS cropSideImageURL , ANALYSIS.CROP_VERTICAL_IMAGE AS cropVerticalImageURL FROM CROP_ANALYSIS_INFO ANALYSIS ,CROP_ENVIR_INFO ENVIR WHERE ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_NO = ENVIR.ENVIR_NO GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%H:%i')
